Name: Milkyway Funland
About the game: Milkyway Funland is a collection of stunning, exciting, and fun VR games and experiences. The game takes you to the galaxy’s best amusement park in the 31st century. In this space station, everyone can try and experience incredible and impossible things from the past, present, and future. Like, how it feels to become a classic cartoon hero, a mighty knight or fly with handheld thrusters, and many more. Features The game features 8 different VR experiences and more will come. Suitable for everyone – the park has games for both experienced players and VR newcomers – it also features comfortable and more intense experiences. You can start to explore the Funland and dive into the games for free.
